pme.ai.fhe.de.studybuddy.utilities

Class AddSpinnerItems

  • java.lang.Object
    • pme.ai.fhe.de.studybuddy.utilities.AddSpinnerItems

  • public class AddSpinnerItems
extends java.lang.Object
    The class AddSpinnerItems is a utility-class. It adds a List of items to an ArrayAdapter with a specific layout so that the ArrayAdapter can be assigned to a view item spinner. This class exists for code-reuse purposes.

        public static android.widget.ArrayAdapter<java.lang.String> setArrayAdapter(android.content.Context context,
                                                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> itemList)
